languages.text: {n}Очередной слой реальности рассекает трещина, и перед вами оказывается... Она. Окинув вас цепким изучающим взглядом, Теодора позволяет себе легкую, немного ироничную улыбку.{/n}
{n}As yet another layer of reality cracks, a figure appears before you... Her. After giving you a probing and appraising look, Theodora permits herself a slight smile.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Очередной слой реальности рассекает трещина, и перед вами оказывается... Она. Окинув вас цепким изучающим взглядом, Теодора позволяет себе легкую, немного ироничную улыбку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Another layer of reality is split by a crack, and the one who appears in front of you is... Her. Giving you a tenacious, appraising look, Theodora lets out a light, slightly ironical smile come to her lips.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

traits.locale_text: {n}Another layer of reality is split by a crack, and the one who appears in front of you is... Her. Giving you a tenacious, appraising look, Theodora lets out a light, slightly ironical smile come to her lips.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

traits.locale_text: {n}Another layer of reality is split by a crack and the one who appears in front of you is... Her. Giving you a tenacious, appraising look, Theodora breaks into a light and a smidge ironical smile.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

traits.locale_text: {n}Another layer of reality is split by a crack and the one who appears in front of you is... Her. Giving you a tenacious, appraising look, Theodora breaks into a light and a smidge ironical smile.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

traits.locale_text: {n}As yet another layer of reality cracks, a figure appears before you... Her. After giving you a probing and appraising look, Theodora permits herself a slight smile.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

traits.locale_text: {n}As yet another layer of reality cracks, a figure appears before you... Her. After giving you a probing and appraising look, Theodora permits herself a slight smile.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

languages.text: {n}Alors qu'une nouvelle couche de la réalité se fissure, une silhouette apparaît devant vous... C'est elle. Théodora vous jauge du regard et se permet un léger sourire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As yet another layer of reality cracks, a figure appears before you... Her. After giving you a probing and appraising look, Theodora permits herself a slight smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Alors qu'une nouvelle couche de la réalité se fissure, une silhouette apparaît devant vous... C'est elle. Théodora vous jauge du regard et se permet un léger sourire.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

languages.text: {n}Una grieta rasga otra capa de la realidad, y aparece una figura frente a ti: es ella. Con una mirada tenaz y analítica, Theodora esboza una sonrisa leve.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As yet another layer of reality cracks, a figure appears before you... Her. After giving you a probing and appraising look, Theodora permits herself a slight smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una grieta rasga otra capa de la realidad, y quien aparece frente a ti es... ella. Con una mirada tenaz y analítica, Theodora esboza una sonrisa leve y algo irónica.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

languages.text: {n}现实再次出现了裂缝，出现在你面前的人是……她。西奥多拉赞许地看了你一眼，脸上露出了淡淡的笑容。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As yet another layer of reality cracks, a figure appears before you... Her. After giving you a probing and appraising look, Theodora permits herself a slight smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}现实再次出现了裂缝，出现在你面前的人是……她。西奥多拉赞许地看了你一眼，脸上露出了愉快的笑容，还有一丝讽刺的微笑。{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

languages.text: {n}Als eine weitere Schicht der Realität birst, erscheint vor dir eine Gestalt ... Sie. Nach einem prüfenden und abwägenden Blick gestattet sich Theodora ein sanftes Lächeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As yet another layer of reality cracks, a figure appears before you... Her. After giving you a probing and appraising look, Theodora permits herself a slight smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine weitere Schicht der Realität bricht krachend entzwei, und vor dir erscheint ... sie. Theodora blickt dich unerbittlich, prüfend an, dann beginnt sie leicht und ein wenig ironisch zu lächeln.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

languages.text: {n}現実の層がまた1つ裂け、そこから人影が現れる。それは…彼女だった。あなたをじっと見定めるような視線を送りつつ、シオドーラは気軽に、そしてかすかな笑みを浮かべた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As yet another layer of reality cracks, a figure appears before you... Her. After giving you a probing and appraising look, Theodora permits herself a slight smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}現実の層がまた1つ裂け、そこから人影が現れる。それは…彼女だった。あなたをじっと見定めるような視線を送りつつ、シオドーラは気軽に、そしてかすかな笑みを浮かべた。{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

languages.text: {n}Gerçekliğin bir katmanı daha kırılırken önünde bir figür beliriyor... O. Sana soğukkanlı ve yargılayıcı bir bakış attıktan sonra Theodora hafifçe gülümsüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As yet another layer of reality cracks, a figure appears before you... Her. After giving you a probing and appraising look, Theodora permits herself a slight smile.{/n}
